treatment_goal_palliative_confirmation_q: Do you wish to receive palliative treatment?

adjust_arrow_explanation.title: Adjust treatment target
adjust_arrow_explanation.content: Tap the red compass needle to adjust the orientation to your liking.

curative_explanation.title: What does curative mean?
curative_explanation.content: Everything medically possible and sensible is done to preserve my life. I accept the burdens associated with life support.

palliative_explanation.title: What does palliative mean?
palliative_explanation.content: The treatment is primarily aimed at alleviating my suffering. I accept a possible shortening of my lifespan.
